SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETCOUNTRYID_COLUMN
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: BETHESDA\cmayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETCOUNTRYID_COLUMN (@childProjectID uniqueidentifier) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin declare @countryID uniqueidentifier select @countryID = COUNTRYEXTENSIONID from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION where ID = @childProjectID
return @countryID end
